title: Jiminy's Is Fighting Climate Change One Pet Treat At A Time - Forbes
body: Jiminy's Chewy Cricket Treat. Jiminy's 2022. Carlson tells the story of Lauren, a millennial Jiminy's customer who refers to her dog Mordecai as "her son."

title: Sustainable pet food can help fight climate change. Here's how. - The Washington Post
body: A couple of years ago, Anne Carlson — the founder of Jiminy's, a dog food start-up — conducted a taste test with her dog, Timber. She filled half of his bowl with the meat-based food the ...
